      static java.awt.event.ActionListener createListener(java.awt.Component component, java.awt.event.ActionListener mainActionListener)
      Creates an ActionListener that will still do the same action processing as the given ActionListener while also displaying a loading cursor if the time it takes to execute the given process exceeds the time (in milliseconds) specified in this.DELAY

    • Method Detail

      • createListener

        public static java.awt.event.ActionListener createListener(java.awt.Component component,
                                                           java.awt.event.ActionListener mainActionListener)
        Creates an ActionListener that will still do the same action processing as the given ActionListener while also displaying a loading cursor if the time it takes to execute the given process exceeds the time (in milliseconds) specified in this.DELAY

        Sources consulted: http://www.catalysoft.com/articles/busycursor.html

        Parameters:
        component - The component you want to set the cursor for
        mainActionListener - The ActionListener that does the intended action processing
        Returns:
        An ActionListener object that does the same action processing as mainActionListener while also modifying the cursor if needed
